      • main

        The initial starting point of the program. It is only called whenever the program is started from scratch without a restart.
        Parameters:
        args - The command line arguments. (Unused)

      • setConfigDataValue

        public static void setConfigDataValue(java.lang.String key,
                      java.lang.String value)
        Set a CONFIG_DATA value in the HashMap and the arrow.config file. If the key is not already in the file, it will add it to the end.
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the property to set.
        value - The value of the property to set.

      • newProject

        public void newProject()
        Creates a Dialog to ask for the project name. Next it creates a directory/folder for the project and refreshes the file viewer.

      • newFile

        public void newFile()
        Creates new file and saves the old one. Switches to the new file for editing automatically.

      • contentChanged

        public void contentChanged(net.foxycorndog.arrowide.components.ContentEvent event)
        Implemented method that occurs whenever the content of a TextField is changed. In this case it tells you that the current file has been changed and needs to be saved.

      • setFileSaved

        public void setFileSaved(java.lang.String location,
                boolean saved)
        Set the tab and TreeMenu item associated with the file location to start with a '*' depending if the file is saved or not.
        Parameters:
        location - The location of the file to set as saved or not.
        saved - Whether the file is saved or not.

      • tabClosing

        public boolean tabClosing(int tabId)
        Implemented method that is called whenever a tab's close icon is pressed. If the file in the tab is not saved, ask whether to save it or not.
        Specified by:
        tabClosing in interface net.foxycorndog.arrowide.tabmenu.TabMenuListener
        Parameters:
        tabId - The id of the tab that is closing.
        Returns:
        Whether to close the tab or not.

      • tabSelected

        public void tabSelected(int tabId)
        Implemented method that is called whenever a tab is selected in a TabMenu. It then opens the file.
        Specified by:
        tabSelected in interface net.foxycorndog.arrowide.tabmenu.TabMenuListener
        Parameters:
        tabId - the id of the tab that was selected.
